title: Beats - beat freq in terms of periods T-A and T-B

content.question: Two tuning forks, Fork <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> and Fork <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>, oscillate with slightly different periods <math alttext="T sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></math> and <math alttext="T sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></math>, respectively. What is the beat frequency of the sound waves produced when the two tuning forks are both oscillating near each other?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 1 and denominator, the absolute value of, T sub A, end sub, minus, T sub B, end sub, end absolute value" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the absolute value of, the fraction with numerator 1 and denominator, T sub A, end sub, end fraction, minus, the fraction with numerator 1 and denominator T sub B, end sub, end fraction, end absolute value" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>|</mo></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 and denominator T sub A, end sub, plus T sub B, end sub, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half times, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator 1 and denominator, T sub A, end sub, end fraction, plus, the fraction with numerator 1 and denominator T sub B, end sub, end fraction, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the absolute value of, the fraction with numerator 1 and denominator, T sub A, end sub, end fraction, minus, the fraction with numerator 1 and denominator T sub B, end sub, end fraction, end absolute value" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>|</mo></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
